title: Hourly to Salary Calculator
description: Convert hourly pay into annual salary using configurable work assumptions.
methodSummary: Annual salary = hourly rate × hours per week × weeks worked
assumptions: Default assumes 52 working weeks unless changed.
Does not factor in variable taxes or deductions.
insights: Many salaried roles include unpaid overtime which lowers effective hourly pay.
Contractors typically price 20–40% higher due to risk and benefits gaps.

faqs.q: How many hours per year is full-time?
faqs.a: Full-time commonly ranges between 1,750–2,080 hours annually depending on country.
